channel.title: Comments on: 2011: That Time I Packed A Lifetime Into A Single Year
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Justin Dearing
item.dc:creator: Justin Dearing
item.content:encoded:
You had quite the year!

Did you purposefully decide to introduce yourself to as many people as possible as PASS? Was it a not be shy thing? Dunbar’s number would indicate that you can’t hold a relationship with more than ~150 people at a time, and I doubt you could remember that many names. However, assuming post people there didn’t hyper network as much as you did, they probably remember you.

item.title: By: Neil Hambly
item.dc:creator: Neil Hambly
item.description: Jes - You definitely did take SQLPASS and our SQL Community by storm, it was awesome to meet you and be a fellow 1st time presenter @ SQLPASS (do hope we can repeat that again soon) .. Also hope to meet you again @ one of the SQLSaturdays in 2012 and of course SQLPASS
item.content:encoded: Jes – You definitely did take SQLPASS and our SQL Community by storm, it was awesome to meet you and be a fellow 1st time presenter @ SQLPASS (do hope we can repeat that again soon) .. Also hope to meet you again @ one of the SQLSaturdays in 2012 and of course SQLPASS

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Congratz Jes...hope 2012 will be even more awesome for you
item.content:encoded: Congratz Jes…hope 2012 will be even more awesome for you

item.title: By: Chris Shaw
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaw
item.description: It has been awesome to see you around. I hope for another great year....
item.content:encoded: It has been awesome to see you around. I hope for another great year….
